Description: Pendant: of opaque yellow glass is penannular in form. There is a suspension loop of the body material. Three prefabricated twisted cords of opaque white and semi-translucent pale blue run around the outer circumference of the thick crescent from open end to open end where they form two vertical loops, one of which is now damaged. Once worn from wires through the ear-lobe.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (fig.36, p.36)
